UPCOMING FAIRS & EVENTS EVENT REPEATER Maryland State Fair Aug. 21st - Sep. 7th LUTHERVILLE-TIMONIUM, MD › BUY TICKETS › More Info END EVENT REPEATER EVENT REPEATER Isle of Wight County Fair Sep. 11th - 14th Windsor, VA › BUY TICKETS › More Info END EVENT REPEATER EVENT REPEATER State Fair of Virginia Sep. 26th - Oct. 5th Doswell, VA › BUY TICKETS › More Info END EVENT REPEATER EVENT REPEATER Greater Jacksonville Fair Nov. 6th - 16th Jacksonville, FL › More Info END EVENT REPEATER begin content-box area AMERICA'S SPECTACULAR MIDWAY Deggeller Attractions is not just any carnival company, we are America's #1 Carnival company! We are known for our spectacular assortment of amusement rides, keen sense of quality and detail,and an emphasis on safety. We are industry leaders in customer service and are proud to be ranked in OABA's Circle of Excellence. We service events large and small such as the Maryland State Fair, Virginia State Fair,Clay County Agriculture Fair, and many more quality events throughout the eastern United States.
